translation:
I have been passing without major news, despite great headaches yesterday and today.

Tomorrow I suppose our electoral work will end, and if possible I intend to return on Thursday or Friday. A hug to our Mingote and Bernardino, whom I have missed very much, and I wish to already embrace my Mingote.

Recommendations to the godmother, godfathers, and everyone in general.

Your old friend at heart Almeida. Rio Grande, October 21, 1828.

Mrs. Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida. Pelotas.
